description:
This is a class for both new and experienced writers who wish to overcome writer's block and fill their blank pages with inspiration and creativity.

Take this Creative Writing Course now and learn to unleash the creative writer within you. Gain confidence in your creative abilities. Learn how to overcome your writer's Block. Discover the enjoyment and playfulness of daydreaming and imagining on paper!
title: Block Buster: Overcoming Writer's Block
